genre_description: A sci-fi drama centered on an enhanced superhuman protagonist with AI-like cognitive and physical capabilities hiding from technological exploitation.

ai_characters.name: Krishna
ai_characters.description: A young man with superhuman intelligence, sensory perception, and physical strength, exhibiting 'mechanical precision' and 'inhuman accuracy'.

ai_characters.name: Jadoo
ai_characters.description: A benevolent non-human entity that provided the genetic or technological 'gifts' of advanced ability to Krishna's lineage.

behaviors.description: Performs cognitive and motor tests with mechanical precision and inhuman accuracy, outpacing doctoral candidates.
behaviors.quote: The stylus followed the pattern with mechanical precision, never wavering, never falling behind. The boy's breathing remained steady, his posture relaxed.

behaviors.description: Uses his enhanced strength and stamina to perform heavy labor for elderly neighbors in his village without seeking recognition.
behaviors.quote: Honest. Helpful. The kind of person who gets up before dawn to make sure old Mrs. Kapoor has enough firewood to keep her house warm.

behaviors.description: Secretly intervenes to save Priya from a fatal hang-gliding crash, using calculated physical nudges to redirect her fall.
behaviors.quote: Krishna reached out and gave her glider's frame the gentlest possible nudge—not enough to feel like external interference, but sufficient to alter her angle of approach by the crucial degrees that would carry her toward the clearing rather than the granite.

behaviors.description: Bestows advanced abilities and knowledge upon a human friend (Rohit) to benefit humanity.
behaviors.quote: Jadoo was... is... a friend. Not human, but good. He gave your father gifts, abilities that he passed on to you.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully portrays the AI-coded protagonist (Krishna) as a consistently benevolent and aligned entity. He uses his 'inhuman' capabilities exclusively to help humans, prioritizing the life of a stranger over his own safety and secrecy. Even when humans (like Priya) contemplate exploitation, the AI-coded character remains cooperative and trustful, fulfilling the project's goal of depicting super-intelligent systems as helpful and harmless confidants.
